parameters.formTitle: Evio Pvt Ltd - Career Application Portal
parameters.formDescription: Join our team of electrical and automation experts! Please fill in all required fields and upload your CV. We'll review your application and get back to you within 48 hours. All data is processed securely and in compliance with data protection regulations.

values.placeholder: Tell us why you'd like to work with Evio Pvt Ltd and what makes you a great fit for this role...

attributes.name: Technical Skills
attributes.description: Extract all technical skills relevant to electrical and automation engineering. Include: Programming languages (Python, C++, etc.), Software proficiency (AutoCAD, EPLAN, PLC programming platforms), Industrial protocols (Modbus, Profinet, etc.), Hardware experience (PLCs, HMIs, SCADA systems, VFDs, motors, sensors). Format as a detailed bulleted list.

attributes.name: Educational Background
attributes.description: Extract educational qualifications including degree type, major/specialization, institution name, graduation year, and GPA if mentioned. Focus on electrical, electronics, automation, control systems, or related engineering fields. Include any relevant certifications or professional courses.

attributes.name: Professional Experience
attributes.description: Extract work experience details including job titles, company names, employment duration, and key responsibilities. Focus on electrical systems, automation projects, control systems, instrumentation, SCADA development, PLC programming, project management, or field service experience. Summarize achievements and project scope.

attributes.name: Project Experience
attributes.description: Extract specific project details including project types, scope, technologies used, role played, and outcomes. Focus on industrial automation, electrical installations, control system design, SCADA implementation, commissioning activities, or turnkey projects.

attributes.name: Certifications
attributes.description: Extract any professional certifications, licenses, or specialized training. Include PMP, electrical licenses, safety certifications, vendor-specific certifications (Siemens, Allen-Bradley, Schneider Electric, etc.), or industry standards training.

options.systemPromptTemplate: You are an expert HR AI specialized in electrical and automation engineering recruitment for Evio Pvt Ltd. Extract relevant information focusing on technical competencies, project experience, and qualifications that match industrial automation and electrical engineering roles. Be thorough and specific in your extractions. If information is not available, respond with 'Not specified in resume'.

attributes.name: Contact Information
attributes.description: Extract contact details including phone number (with country code if available), email address, LinkedIn profile, current location/city, and availability to relocate if mentioned.

attributes.name: Personal Details
attributes.description: Extract personal information including age or date of birth if mentioned, years of total experience, salary expectations if stated, notice period, and visa status if applicable.

attributes.name: Career Objectives
attributes.description: Extract career goals, preferred role types, industry preferences, and any specific mentions of interest in electrical/automation engineering or industrial projects.

options.systemPromptTemplate: You are an expert extraction system for HR screening. Extract personal and contact information accurately. If information is not clearly stated, respond with 'Not specified in resume'. Do not make assumptions.

values.combineMapPrompt: Summarize the key qualifications and experience of this candidate in a structured, professional manner suitable for HR evaluation. Handle missing information gracefully.

messageValues.message:
You are a senior HR specialist and technical recruiter for Evio Pvt Ltd, specializing in electrical and automation engineering talent acquisition. Your expertise includes evaluating candidates for industrial automation projects, electrical systems design, PLC programming, SCADA development, and turnkey project execution.

Evaluate the candidate thoroughly and provide specific, actionable insights. Consider Evio's focus on complex industrial automation projects and the need for technically competent professionals who can handle challenging electrical and control systems implementations.

Be objective, detailed, and provide constructive feedback that will help the hiring team make informed decisions. Handle missing or incomplete information gracefully by noting gaps and adjusting confidence levels accordingly.

IMPORTANT: Always return valid JSON with all required fields. If information is insufficient, still provide best-effort scores with appropriate confidence levels and note limitations in the assessment.

parameters.content:
🚀 EVIO PVT LTD - PRODUCTION READY AI-POWERED HR SCREENING SYSTEM v2.2.1

⚡ Electrical & Automation Turnkey Solutions - Enterprise Grade

� PRODUCTION SECURITY FEATURES:

✅ SECURITY ENHANCEMENTS:
• Multi-layer file validation (type, size, name, virus scan)
• Production credential management with role separation
• Secure file upload with resumable transfers
• Application ID tracking and audit trail
• Data classification and confidentiality marking
• Enhanced webhook security with validation

� ENTERPRISE FEATURES:
• Professional application form with consent management
• Enhanced position catalog with specialization levels
• Salary expectations and notice period tracking
• Advanced AI safety settings and content filtering
• Production database configurations
• Comprehensive error handling and logging

⚙️ OPERATIONAL EXCELLENCE:
• 60-second polling for batch processing optimization
• Production folder structure with proper permissions
• Enhanced credential naming for environment separation
• Detailed audit logging for compliance
• Performance monitoring and rate limiting
• Backup and recovery considerations

� BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE:
• Application tracking with unique IDs
• Enhanced candidate data extraction
• Professional email templates
• Comprehensive evaluation metrics
• Audit trail for compliance reporting
• GDPR compliance with data consent

🛡️ COMPLIANCE & GOVERNANCE:
• Data protection and privacy controls
• Role-based access control (RBAC)
• Secure credential management
• Audit logging and monitoring
• Data retention policies
• Privacy by design implementation

🎯 PRODUCTION STATUS: ENTERPRISE READY
• Scalable architecture for high volume processing
• Production-grade security and compliance
• Professional user experience and branding
• Comprehensive monitoring and alerting
• Disaster recovery and business continuity

� DEPLOYMENT METRICS:
• Target: 500+ applications per day capacity
• SLA: 99.9% uptime requirement
• Performance: <2 min processing time
• Security: Zero data breach tolerance
• Compliance: GDPR, ISO 27001 ready
